suite.name: Login Tests

test.name: Login Exitoso Con Credenciales Validas

kw.name: Abrir Navegador
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.
Abre el navegador y maximiza la ventana

kw.name: Login Exitoso
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Realiza login con credenciales válidas

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Cerrar Navegador
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Cierra el navegador

test.doc: Verifica que el login funcione con credenciales válidas Este es un caso de prueba positivo
